short_summary: Portfolio Management Office, Innovation Strategy and Digital Products
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title
(TBIPS) Portfolio Management Office, Innovation Strategy and Digital Products

### Project Title
SPICT Bureau de gestion de portefeuille, stratégie d’innovation et produits numériques

### Reference Information

*   Solicitation Reference Number: PW-22-01010860
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Solicitation Number: 1000401273
*   Publication Date: October 21, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: November 15, 2022

### Contract Information
*   Contracting Entity: Canada Border Services Agency
*   Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
*   Expected Contract End Date: To be determined
*   Contract Period: Three years with an irrevocable option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods
*   Number of Contracts: 1

### Procurement Details

*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region

### Trade Agreements

*   Agreement: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Agreement: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Agreement: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Agreement: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Agreement: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Agreement: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Agreement: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Agreement: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Agreement: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Agreement: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Agreement: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information
*   Contact Name: Anderson-Léger, Teagan
*   Contact Email: [teagan.leger@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:teagan.leger@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca)

### Document Collection
The solicitation package, including the procurement notice and documentation, is available for review on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell platform at the following URLs:

*   English: https://canadabuys.canada
